name: Adorable Beats
description:
Is the date going to be a success? That's up to you! Come join another modern love story to the tunes of some good music

Numerous well-known 2020 songs to choose from Ape Escape 3D
Huge song playlist to choose
Weekly updated new contents
Easy to play with simple control
Spectacular music game experiences
Play with rhythm and music
Unique gameplay and relaxation experience
Summer Hit
Harder than it looks
Are you ready for the challenge
